verses.verse: How is the gold<WH2091> become dim<WH6004>! how is the most<WH2896> pure gold<WH3800> changed<WH8132>! The stones<WH68> of the sanctuary<WH6944> are poured out<WH8210> at the head<WH7218> of every street<WH2351>.

The hands<WH3027> of the pitiful<WH7362> women<WH802> have boiled<WH1310> their own children<WH3206>; They were their food<WH1262> in the destruction<WH7667> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971>.

Jehovah <WH3068> hath accomplished<WH3615> his wrath<WH2534>, he hath poured out<WH8210> his fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639>; And he hath kindled<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in Zion<WH6726>, which hath devoured<WH398> the foundations thereof<WH3247>.

Depart <WH5493> ye<WH7121>, they cried unto them<WH2931>, Unclean! depart<WH5493>, depart<WH5493>, touch<WH5060> not<WH5132>! When they fled away and wandered<WH5128>, men said<WH559> among the nations<WH1471>, They shall no more<WH3254> sojourn here<WH1481>.
